text: It's time to take action against cervical cancer! 🚨👩‍🤝‍👦 Get vaccinated and get tested regularly to prevent this preventable disease. 💉👍 Did you know that the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists recommends a Pap test every 3 years for women aged 21-29? 🤔📚 Learn more about free breast and cervical cancer screening resources in Massachusetts and don't wait to take control of your health! 💪🏼💕
